name: Reminiscence Asylum
description:
With your lantern you can see your past, search for the notes and remember what happened years ago.

Control:

-WASD to move 

-'Right Click' to turn on Lantern

- 'E' Key to Interact with objects

Credits: 

- Joaquín Agesta

- Victor Tenecela (Tcela)
